item.title: On my 33rd Birthday
item.author: Xing Lin
item.description: How time flies! I am 33 years old now and have lived in US for more than 10 years. I have also graduated from University of Utah for almost 5 years now. Wahoo! Each week passed very quickly. Now is the time to pause a little bit and reflect what has been achieved and what could be done better. Achievements Worked on a few projects/papers and made a few submissions to FAST/ATC/HotStorage, though none of them have been accepted yet.
